alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:35PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Leake, northeastern Rankin, northwestern Scott and east central Madison Counties through 630 PM CST... At 535 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pisgah, or 12 miles east of Canton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farmhaven around 545 PM CST. Ludlow around 550 PM CST. Tuscola around 605 PM CST. Carthage around 610 PM CST. Madden and Renfroe around 625 PM CST. Edinburg around 630 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi.
